description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d59pl","text":"This protocol describes the DQ BSA assay for measuring the lysosomal proteolytic activity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6bjcf","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q8o5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ko7q","text":"DQ BSA - #D12051 (1mg/ml prepared in sterile PBS), working concentration 10μg/ml.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9rou","text":"BSA-488 - #A13100 (5mg/ml prepared in sterile PBS), working concentration 5 μg/ml.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uj4e","text":"Mattek glass bottom dishes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flvml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g0rq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8tc1f","text":"Plate 100,000 mature macrophages or microglia or BMDM were seeded on Mattek glass bottom dishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23mk9","text":"Next day treat cells with   MLi2 or   LRRK2-IN-1 for   followed by   treatment with   DQ-BSA (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #D12051) and   Alexa-488 BSA (Thermo Fisher Scientific #A13100) in the media containing inhibitors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drja0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"51C1F040FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"250","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5C9ABBA0FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"66EDB530FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"6E468190FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"71FB9A50FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"8C96F940FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dqpjs","text":"After 3 hours wash the cells 3X with culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a3pa","text":"Then add   culture media to the washed cells and return to incubator for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj53m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"A52DFCB0FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"B3E7ABC0FB8511EDA69A9FF1BCE08CA4","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
